players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob was a good guy, he's gone now."
You: "I saw Bob last night and he didn't do anything suspicious. I think we should investigate him further."
Charlie: "Bob was a good guy, he's gone now. I think we should investigate Diana further."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found out he's the mafioso. Bob was likely killed by him. I suggest we investigate Charlie further."
